#summary This page presents the objectives of the OOR initiative and highlights alignments and disparities with the objectives of the COLORE initiatives.

= Introduction =

The analysis that follows is derived from various sources of information including:
 * The [http://ontolog.cim3.net/file/work/OOR-Ontolog-Panel/2010-04-01_OOR-Use-Cases-III/OOR-UseCaseReview--ToddSchneider_20100401.pdf OOR Use Case Review] presented to the OOR team by Todd Schneider on April 1, 2010.
